metadata.description: Soulware: Origins is a Genesis collection of 101 NFTs anchored in the Ethereum blockchain as snapshots of inner child. Each Origin is categorized according to the hardware they wear around their neck: USB, Tape, Floppy Disc, CD and SD. Provided with custom songs and animated background, meticulously hand drawn. Zero and T.R.U.E are a special case, the 99 others will fragment their souls into 100 pieces each by entering the Metaverse resulting in a generative collection of 9,902 Soulware. Welcome to the Soulware Project.
metadata.name: Soulware OG #001
